teamMembers.name: Suhith Ghanathay
teamMembers.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

teamMembers.name: Riddhi Jignesh Kumar
teamMembers.quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.

teamMembers.name: Mike Johnson
teamMembers.quote: Data is the new oil. It's valuable, but if unrefined it cannot really be used.

teamMembers.name: Emily Brown
teamMembers.quote: Machine learning is the science of getting computers to learn without being explicitly programmed.

teamMembers.name: Alex Lee
teamMembers.quote: The art of management is to make difficult things easy.
